alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 18 at 4:46PM ChST until January 22 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND DRY CONDITIONS COULD LEAD TO RAPID FIRE SPREAD... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WIND...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 50 percent in the afternoons. * HIGHEST THREAT...Southern parts of Guam, especially higher terrain and windward slopes (facing north or east) during the daytime hours. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will decrease slightly by Friday night but remain gusty through the weekend.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
